comment._content: This man was my Grandfather. His son, my dad was also a boxer, William John Kelly.

Dear Candee,
Spike Kelly was my grandfather. also.  I am your cousin Bob Pack in Solvang, CA.  Would love to be in touch with you and your brother about our family and these great photos.  Please email me or my wife, Jean at macpac195@aol.com and jlp134@aol.com.
Hope to hear from you soon!
Bob and Jean
